body: These lenses interfere with the wearer's ability to see color, and everything appears in shades of black and white, as if the wearer were using darkvision. Once per day the wearer can use color spray, hypnotic pattern, and rainbow pattern.
name: Rainbow Lenses
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Eyes/Eyes Slot Wondrous Items/Rainbow Lenses
